title: Man Utd keep Champions League hopes on track with win over Reading
shortDescription: Leah Galton struck twice in a thrilling first half to help Manchester United Women to a 3-1 victory at Reading.

title: Papers: Chelsea still owe Inter £71m for Lukaku deal
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's national newspapers...

title: Nev and Keane question mentality: 'Big problems in Man Utd's dressing room'
shortDescription: Gary Neville and Roy Keane give their thoughts on Ralf Rangnick and Cristiano Romaldo's relationship following the 3-2 win over Tottenham.

title: McEneff stars as Hearts reach semis
shortDescription: Super sub Aaron McEneff grabbed a goal and an assist to send Hearts into the Scottish Cup semi-finals with a 4-2 win over St Mirren.

title: Why Olise is catching Southgate's eye
shortDescription: Sky Sports takes a look at what makes Crystal Palace winger Michael Olise so special ahead of their Monday Night Football clash with Manchester City...

title: PL hits and misses: Ronaldo heroics save Utd | Diaz now Liverpool's danger man
shortDescription: Record-breaking Cristiano Ronaldo's game-winning hat-trick papers over the cracks as Manchester United flatter to deceive in 3- 2 win over Tottenham.

title: Ronaldo's spectacular hat-trick sinks Spurs
shortDescription: Cristiano Ronaldo scored a spectacular hat-trick to take Manchester United up to fourth with a 3-2 win over Tottenham at Old Trafford.

title: Keane: Ronaldo a 'genius' | Nev: Man Utd not so good
shortDescription: Cristiano Ronaldo was labelled a 'genius' by Roy Keane after his spectacular hat-trick guided Man Utd to a vital, yet uninspiring, 3-2 win over Tottenham.

title: Romero screams in Maguire's face  | Keane: Noted
shortDescription: Roy Keane says Man Utd players will have 'noted' Cristian Romero's reaction to Harry Maguire's own goal.

title: Ronaldo scores three in Old Trafford cracker
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Manchester United's win over Tottenham in the Premier League.

title: Ronaldo scores screamer | Keane: It's genius
shortDescription: Roy Keane called Cristiano Ronaldo's goal 'genius' after he opened the scoring for Manchester United against Tottenham from distance.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: Fulham held, Bournemouth win
shortDescription: Championship leaders Fulham are held at Barnsley, Bournemouth move back up to second after beating Derby; League One top two Rotherham and Wigan both draw

title: Diaz on target as Liverpool win at Brighton
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Liverpool's win at Brighton in the Premier League.

title: Dack pen miss costs Blackburn as Bristol City snatch late win
shortDescription: Andreas Weimann scored a dramatic added-time winner as Bristol City snatched an unlikely 1-0 win at promotion-chasing Blackburn in the Sky Bet Championship.

title: Frustrated Hull held by Birmingham
shortDescription: Hull only had themselves to blame for failing to put lacklustre Birmingham to the sword in a 0-0 draw at St Andrew's.

title: Late Clarke-Harris pen earns point for Posh
shortDescription: Jonson Clarke-Harris scored a crucial late penalty for struggling Peterborough to help secure a 2-2 draw against Stoke.

title: Forest thump Reading to continue play-off charge
shortDescription: Keinan Davis helped Nottingham Forest enhance their play-off credentials as he scored twice in a thumping 4-0 win over Reading.

title: Play-off hopefuls Millwall and Boro draw at The Den
shortDescription: Promotion hopefuls Millwall and Middlesbrough cancelled each other out in a hard-fought goalless draw at the Den.

title: Cardiff held by Preston
shortDescription: Cardiff missed the chance to climb above bitter rivals Swansea in the Sky Bet Championship table after being held to a 0-0 stalemate at home to Preston.

title: Bournemouth back into second after beating Derby
shortDescription: Dominic Solanke scored his 22nd goal of the season to help Bournemouth move back into the automatic promotion places with a 2-0 triumph over relegation-threatened Derby.
